Damage: 7D '''Capsule''': Aegis-class shuttles were designed around delivering troops and vehicles directly onto an active battlefield. Towards this end each shuttle had two airlocks on either side which could open up in seconds to form unloading ramps. The two sets of laser cannon turrets and concussion missile launchers provided covering fire while troops were disembarking. Within its transport compartment an Aegis could carry 3 light combat vehicles, 2 medium combat vehicles, 1 compact heavy vehicle, or up to 40 soldiers and their gear.
